articles.content:
Greetings to Foreign Minister of Maldives
    Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Maldivian counterpart Fathulla Jameel on the occasion of its Independence Day.
 The message wished him greater success in his work, expressing the belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to develop in the common interests of the two peoples.

articles.content:
National meeting held to mark War Victory Day
    Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held in the compound of the monument to victory in the Fatherland Liberlation War today with a large attendance to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great war.
 Present there were senior party, state and army officials and others.    
 Vice marshal Kim Yong Chun, chief of the general staff of the Korean People's Army, made a report at the meeting.
